in pool\ntmoes.ses.http.connection.pool=200\n\n#Update following values if Retry is required for SES call.\n#retry timeout in milli seconds\ntmoes.ses.http.retry.timeout=8000\n#Maximum number of retries for one request\ntmoes.ses.http.no.of.retry.times=5\n#Retry interval in milli seconds\ntmoes.ses.http.retry.interval=2000\n#retry the request if below http response status code returned from HttpResponse, separated by comma(,) as 500,503\ntmoes.ses.retry.http.status=500,503,504\n\n#SES CC Disable service by primary msisdn/imsi\ntmoes.ses.disable.service.url=ses/customercare/v2/services\n\n#SES CC Deactivate Service Subscription by Secondary MSISDN\ntmoes.ses.disable.servicefor2ndimsi.url=ses/customercare/v2/esimSubscription\n\n#SES CC API Delete Device Profile url\ntmoes.ses.delete.device.profile.url=ses/customercare/v2/devices\n\n#SES Update Paired Primary Device IMSI - BR192\ntmoes.ses.update.paired.primary.device.imsi=ses/customercare/v2/updatePairedPrimaryDeviceImsi\n\n#SES Update Paired Primary Device MSISDN - BR192\ntmoes.ses.update.paired.primary.device.msisdn=ses/customercare/v2/updatePairedPrimaryDeviceMsisdn\n\ntmoes.ses.msisdn.country.code=1\n\n# Authentication\n#tmoes.ses.authentication.username=ACA_CC\n#tmoes.ses.authentication.password=ACA_pwd01\ntmoes.ses.authentication.username=admin\ntmoes.ses.authentication.password=password\n\n#Additional Info for Events\n#format is ses.<EventType>\nses.CHANGE_IMSI={additionalInfo: {externalEvent:NAP_CHANGE_IMSI, source:AccountChangeEventAdapter}}\nses.CHANGE_MSISDN={additionalInfo: {externalEvent:NAP_CHANGE_MSISDN, source:AccountChangeEventAdapter}}\nses.DELETE_ACCOUNT={additionalInfo: {externalEvent:NAP_DELETE_ACCOUNT, source:AccountChangeEventAdapter}}\nses.SUSPEND_MSISDN={additionalInfo: {externalEvent:NAP_SUSPEND_ACCOUNT, source:AccountChangeEventAdapter}}\nses.CANCEL_MSISDN={additionalInfo: {externalEvent:NAP_CANCEL_ACCOUNT, source:AccountChangeEventAdapter}}\nses.CHANGE_FEATURE={additionalInfo: {externalEvent:NAP_CHANGE_FEATURE, source:AccountChangeEventAdapter}}\n\nses.CHANGE_IMSI.delete.nativeVowifi.flag=false\nses.CHANGE_MSISDN.delete.nativeVowifi.flag=false\nses.DELETE_ACCOUNT.delete.nativeVowifi.flag=false\nses.SUSPEND_MSISDN.delete.nativeVowifi.flag=false\nses.CANCEL_MSISDN.delete.nativeVowifi.flag=false\nses.CHANGE_FEATURE.delete.nativeVowifi.flag=false\n\n#Query param \"applicationCategory\" value for SES CC Delete Service API\n#format is ses.<EventType>.delete.application.category , values seperated by ,\nses.CHANGE_IMSI.delete.application.category=\nses.CHANGE_MSISDN.delete.application.category=\nses.DELETE_ACCOUNT.delete.application.category=\nses.SUSPEND_MSISDN.delete.application.category=\nses.CANCEL_MSISDN.delete.application.category=\nses.CHANGE_FEATURE.delete.application.category=digits,cdigits\n\n#ignore ACA retry for below SES failure errorcodes\nses.errorcodes=21001,21002 \n\n#Additional parameter for BR192: flags to enable/disable functionalities of BR192\ntmoes.ses.enable.update.paired.imsi.flag=true\ntmoes.ses.enable.update.paired.msisdn.flag=true\n\n### BR228 DES20.2\n#IAM permission call configuration to call or not to call\ntmoes.iam.permission.enable.change.msisdn.flag=enable\ntmoes.iam.permission.enable.restore.msisdn.flag=enable\ntmoes.iam.permission.enable.suspend.msisdn.flag=enable\ntmoes.iam.permission.enable.delete.account.flag=enable\ntmoes.iam.permission.enable.cancel.msisdn.flag=enable\n\n#SES CC delete  API secondary ESIM configuration to call or not to call\ntmoes.delete.esim.secondary.enable.change.imsi.flag=enable\ntmoes.delete.esim.secondary.enable.change.msisdn.flag=disable\ntmoes.delete.esim.secondary.enable.suspend.msisdn.flag=disable\ntmoes.delete.esim.secondary.enable.delete.account.flag=enable\ntmoes.delete.esim.secondary.enable.cancel.msisdn.flag=enable\n\n#SES CC keep secondary subscription configuration\ntmoes.keep.secondary.sub.change.imsi.flag=true\ntmoes.keep.secondary.sub.change.msisdn.flag=true\ntmoes.keep.secondary.sub.suspend.msisdn.flag=true\ntmoes.keep.secondary.sub.delete.account.flag=true\ntmoes.keep.secondary.sub.cancel.msisdn.flag=true\n\n#SES CC EAP AKA token invalidate configuration\ntmoes.eap.aka.token.invalidate.change.imsi.flag=true\ntmoes.eap.aka.token.invalidate.change.msisdn.flag=true\ntmoes.eap.aka.token.invalidate.suspend.msisdn.flag=true\ntmoes.eap.aka.token.invalidate.delete.account.flag=true\ntmoes.eap.aka.token.invalidate.cancel.msisdn.flag=true\n\n#SES CC send push notification configuration\ntmoes.send.push.notification.change.imsi.flag=false\ntmoes.send.push.notification.change.msisdn.flag=false\ntmoes.send.push.notification.suspend.msisdn.flag=false\ntmoes.send.push.notification.delete.account.flag=false\ntmoes.send.push.notification.cancel.msisdn.flag=false\n\n#SES CC parameter name for keep secondary subscription\ntmoes.keep.secondary.sub.param.name=keepSharedModeEsimSub\n\n#SES CC parameter name for EAP AKA token invalidate\ntmoes.eap.aka.token.invalidate.param.name=invalidateImsiEnabled\n\n#SES CC parameter name for Send Push notification\ntmoes.send.push.notification.param.name=triggerPushNotification\n\n#BR248\ntmoes.ses.update.secondary.msisdn.esimsub.url=ses/customercare/v2/esimSubscription/{secondaryMsisdn}\ntmoes.update.secondary.msisdn.esim.sub.enable.update.msisdn.flag=enable\n\n#SES allow or not allow to sim swap block list\ntmoes.ses.update.subtransfer.auth.status=api/subTransferAuth/v1/updateSubTransferAuthStatus\ntmoes.ses.query.subtransfer.auth.status=api/subTransferAuth/v1/querySubTransferAuthStatus\ntmoes.ses.update.make.number.allow=0\ntmoes.ses.update.make.number.notallow=1\ntmoes.ses.query.response.subtransferblocked.param=subTransferBlocked\n"
